description:
The Ten Master Clans (十師族 jusshizoku) is the title given to the Top 10 most influential magic families in Japan. The power of these houses ascends beyond that of judicial authorities.
There are a total of 28 families worthy of the name the Ten Master Clans, and whoever possesses the strongest magic, the top ten will carry the title. The remaining families which serve as replacements are called the 18 Assistant Houses.
name: Jusshizoku
